text: Saransk (; ) is the capital city of the Republic of Mordovia, Russia. In 2010 there were 297,415 people living there. == Twin towns − Sister cities == Saransk is twinned with: * Botevgrad, Bulgaria * Gorzów Wielkopolski, Poland * Sieradz, Poland ==References== == Other websites == * Official website of the city of Saransk Category:Capitals of republics of Russia
title: Saransk
